routes.passenger_routes module

routes.passenger_routes.create_booking()[source]

Create a new booking for the authenticated passenger.

Expects JSON payload with bus_route_id and price. Requires Authorization header with Bearer token. Returns booking confirmation and status code.

routes.passenger_routes.get_my_bookings()[source]

Get all bookings for the authenticated passenger.

Requires Authorization header with Bearer token. Returns list of bookings and status code.

routes.passenger_routes.passenger_login()[source]

Login a passenger.

Expects JSON payload with email and password. Returns JWT token, username, message, and status code.

routes.passenger_routes.register_passenger()[source]

Register a new passenger.

Expects JSON payload with passenger details. Returns success message and HTTP status code.
